summary: This document is a chain of internal FBI emails from December 3, 2019, discussing a media inquiry from a Norwegian journalist. The inquiry concerns whether the FBI wants to speak with a Norwegian citizen (name redacted) and Crown Princess Mette-Marit in connection with the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. The FBI New York office states they are unaware of any current interest in Norway but would be interested in pertinent information.

persons.name: Runa Fjellanger
persons.context: Norwegian journalist from VG newspaper who contacted the FBI National Press Office to inquire about FBI interest in a Norwegian citizen and Crown Princess Mette-Marit regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: Crown Princess Mette-Marit
persons.context: Mentioned in the media inquiry as someone an anonymous FBI agent allegedly claimed the FBI wanted to speak with regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central subject of the FBI investigation; the media inquiry is about potential connections between him, a Norwegian citizen, and Crown Princess Mette-Marit.

connections.description: Media inquiry references an alleged claim that the FBI wants to speak with the Crown Princess regarding Epstein, suggesting a potential connection under investigation.

events.title: Media Inquiry to FBI about Epstein and Norwegian Connections
events.description: Norwegian journalist Runa Fjellanger contacts the FBI National Press Office to ask about reports that the FBI wants to speak with a Norwegian citizen and Crown Princess Mette-Marit regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A Norwegian journalist inquired if the FBI wanted to speak with Crown Princess Mette-Marit of Norway in connection with the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The FBI New York office (Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad) stated they were unaware of any current interest in Norway but would be interested in pertinent information.
The inquiry was prompted by a media report citing an anonymous FBI agent at the American embassy in Stockholm.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination in response to international media inquiries about the Epstein case.
